byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and BERNARD VAUGHAN

abstract: Siblings Jennifer Sosa and Pedro Luis Sosa, who had just emerged from their vehicle after an accident on the Cross Bronx Expressway, are struck by another car; Jennifer is pronounced dead at Jacobi Medical Center, where her brother is reportedly in critical condition.
snippet: Jennifer and Pedro Luis Sosa had crawled from a minivan on the Cross Bronx Expressway on Sunday when a Toyota hit them, officials said.
lead_paragraph: Jennifer and Pedro Luis Sosa had crawled from a minivan on the Cross Bronx Expressway on Sunday when a Toyota hit them, officials said.

headline.main: Woman Killed and Brother Hurt After Leaving Van Amid Pileup
headline.print_headline: Woman Killed and Brother Hurt After Leaving Van Amid Pileup
headline.seo: Woman Killed and Brother Is Hurt on Bronx Highway
